name: The Miracles They Deserve
description: A communication echoes throughout the galaxy, inviting anyone and everyone to a world that can see their wildest wishes become reality. But be careful what you wish for! Keep your eyes open as you explore this world of endless dreams.
rules:
-- Unique Federaton, Klingon, and Borg Faction Missions are available during the event. Open the Event to access them.
-- Using Straal, Fifth Dimension Invader, G. La Forge, Innovators or Luau Q will provide a bonus to Event Faction Missions.
-- Every Event Faction Mission you succeed at earns you Event Victory Points. Collect Victory Points to unlock Event Threshold Rewards.
-- In this event, Squadrons may also compete to advance up the Squadron leaderboards. Join a Squadron to get more rewards!
bonus_text: Crew Bonus: Straal, Fifth Dimension Invader, G. La Forge, Innovators or Luau Q
rewards_teaser: Reach Rank 1 by gaining Victory Points from Event Missions!

featured_crew.name: Sisko
featured_crew.flavor: As Dax struggles with Klingon tradition, Sisko reminds his old friend what she must do and why she is doing it.

featured_crew.name: Invader
featured_crew.flavor: One of the two photonic aliens who mistakenly believed the Captain Proton holodeck program was real and were at war with Doctor Chaotica.

rewards.name: Federation Transmission
rewards.flavor: Spent to acquire Federation faction missions.

rewards.name: Klingon Empire Transmission
rewards.flavor: Spent to acquire Klingon Empire faction missions.

rewards.name: Borg Transmission
rewards.flavor: Spent to acquire Borg faction missions.

rewards.name: Merits
rewards.flavor: Merits can be earned by completing missions. Use Merits to acquire faction-based rewards, upgrades to your ship, and more.

rewards.name: 10x S. Shuttle
rewards.flavor: 10 Standard Boosts. Go to Time Portal to collect!

rewards.name: Chronitons
rewards.flavor: Chronitons allow your crew to take action in these chaotic times. Use Chronitons to replay parts of past missions via the Timeline.

rewards.name: Credits
rewards.flavor: Credits are the galaxy's standard currency. Use Credits in the Time Portal to enlist crew members, build items, and more.

rewards.name: Merits
rewards.flavor: Merits can be earned by completing missions. Use Merits to acquire faction-based rewards, upgrades to your ship, and more.

rewards.name: Training
rewards.flavor: Increases crew XP by 2500.

rewards.flavor: Requisition Shuttle Tokens grant access to an additional Shuttle to use for a single Faction Mission.

rewards.name: Reward Multiplier
rewards.flavor: (Shuttle Missions Only) 2x rewards.

rewards.name: Credits
rewards.flavor: Credits are the galaxy's standard currency. Use Credits in the Time Portal to enlist crew members, build items, and more.

rewards.name: Honor
rewards.flavor: Honor is gained by dismissing crew who have served you well, but are ready for reassignment. Redeem in the Time Portal for exclusive crew, special fusion-related items, training programs, and more.

rewards.name: Voyage Revival
rewards.flavor: Use to instantly revive a failed Voyage.

rewards.name: 10x Portal
rewards.flavor: 10 valuable items. Go to Time Portal to collect!

rewards.flavor: As Dax struggles with Klingon tradition, Sisko reminds his old friend what she must do and why she is doing it.

rewards.name: Rarity
rewards.flavor: Contains ONE of the following 5 Polestars: Common, Uncommon, Rare, Super rare, Legendary

rewards.name: Skill
rewards.flavor: Contains ONE of the following 6 Polestars: Command, Diplomacy, Security, Engineering, Science, Medicine

rewards.name: ISM
rewards.flavor: ISM, or interstellar medium, is the matter that exists between astronomical objects. It can be manipulated by the Q to facilitate crew retrieval. ISM can be obtained from Daily Log-in Rewards, Campaigns and participating in Fleet activities.

rewards.name: Dilithium
rewards.flavor: Dilithium is your most valuable asset. Use Dilithium in the Time Portal to acquire valuable crew members, items, and more.

rewards.flavor: Contains ONE of the following 5 Polestars: Common, Uncommon, Rare, Super rare, Legendary

rewards.name: ISM
rewards.flavor: ISM, or interstellar medium, is the matter that exists between astronomical objects. It can be manipulated by the Q to facilitate crew retrieval. ISM can be obtained from Daily Log-in Rewards, Campaigns and participating in Fleet activities.

rewards.name: Dilithium
rewards.flavor: Dilithium is your most valuable asset. Use Dilithium in the Time Portal to acquire valuable crew members, items, and more.

rewards.name: Honor
rewards.flavor: Honor is gained by dismissing crew who have served you well, but are ready for reassignment. Redeem in the Time Portal for exclusive crew, special fusion-related items, training programs, and more.

rewards.name: Merits
rewards.flavor: Merits can be earned by completing missions. Use Merits to acquire faction-based rewards, upgrades to your ship, and more.

rewards.name: Training
rewards.flavor: Increases crew XP by 2500.

goals.flavor: Find the truth behind the fantasy with the Federation.

potential_rewards.name: Federation Transmission
potential_rewards.flavor: Spent to acquire Federation faction missions.

potential_rewards.name: Credits

rewards.name: Chronitons
rewards.flavor: Chronitons allow your crew to take action in these chaotic times. Use Chronitons to replay parts of past missions via the Timeline.

goals.flavor: Recover the missing with the Klingon Empire.

screens.text: "What is it that lights your heart aflame? The fantasy that seeks you out in the deepest reaches of space. Here, on Elpis V, all your dreams can come true, if you'll only grace us with your presence."

"This communication recently went out all across the galaxy. I'm sure you've seen it. Since then, numerous individuals from different factions have left for the mysterious new planet in the communication's coordinates. But something feels very off about all this."

"Some of those individuals who were the first to visit the world still haven't returned nor have they responded to attempts to reach them. That's why we'd like you to investigate, Captain. And who knows? You might see a miracle or two yourself."

"What is it that lights your heart aflame? The fantasy that seeks you out in the deepest reaches of space. Here, on Elpis V, all your dreams can come true, if you'll only grace us with your presence."

"This communication recently went out all across the galaxy. I'm sure you've seen it. Since then, numerous individuals from different factions have left for the mysterious new planet in the communication's coordinates. But something feels very off about all this."

"Some of those individuals who were the first to visit the world still haven't returned nor have they responded to attempts to reach them. That's why we'd like you to investigate, Captain. And who knows? You might see a miracle or two yourself."

"What is it that lights your heart aflame? The fantasy that seeks you out in the deepest reaches of space. Here, on Elpis V, all your dreams can come true, if you'll only grace us with your presence."

"This communication recently went out all across the galaxy. I'm sure you've seen it. Since then, numerous individuals from different factions have left for the mysterious new planet in the communication's coordinates. But something feels very off about all this."

"Some of those individuals who were the first to visit the world still haven't returned nor have they responded to attempts to reach them. That's why we'd like you to investigate, Captain. And who knows? You might see a miracle or two yourself."
